title: I-539 E-filed form mistake and help on supporting documents
question: I have just finished filing and paying for my I-539. Unfortunately I found a mistake on the Signature part of the form. In the form I was asked to print my name and under it is my title. I have printed my name and placed "Miss" under title. After paying and finalizing I was shown the pdf form of my I-539, but under the signature/printed name the only word that came out is "Miss". Would that be a problem for my application? if so, what can I do to change it?
answers:
I do not see a major problem. You might want to write to immigration with a copy of the receipt telling them about the mistake. Send it by registered mail.

Good Luck
Shah Peerally
